抰字的基本解释

抰
yāng
拿牲口驾车用的皮带击打。

抰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yāng］
［《集韻》倚兩切，上養，影。］
［《廣韻》於郎切，平唐，影。］
(1)击，打。
(2)通“央”。参见“抰振”。

抰字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　抰； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页423第06
【唐韻】於兩切【集韻】倚兩切，?音鞅。【說文】以車鞅擊也。　又【集韻】於郞切，音央。打也。

抰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
抰字的起名意思

暂无。

抰
Basic explanation of words
抰
yāng
Hit with the belt used for driving the animal.
抰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yāng］
["Ji Yun" relies on two cuts, upper support, shadow. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Langqie, Ping Tang, shadow. ]
(1) Hit, hit.
(2) Through the "central". See "抰 vibration".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　抰; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 423 06
[Tang Yun] Yu Liangqie [Jiyun] Leaning on two cuts,? Yin martingale. [Said the text] also hit with the car martingale.　[Jiyun] Yu Yunqie, Yin Yang. Fight too.
